pullRequest.title: Explain verbose stmt to print tupleDesc/slotDesc information
pullRequest.bodyText:
fix #3969
the example：
mysql> explain verbose select sum(j) from t;           
+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| Explain String                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| PLAN FRAGMENT 0                                                 |
|  OUTPUT EXPRS: sum(`j`)                                         |
|   PARTITION: UNPARTITIONED                                      |
|                                                                 |
|   RESULT SINK                                                   |
|                                                                 |
|   3:AGGREGATE (merge finalize)                                  |
|   |  output: sum( sum(`j`))                                     |
|   |  group by:                                                  |
|   |  tuple ids: 1                                               |
|   |                                                             |
|   2:EXCHANGE                                                    |
|      tuple ids: 1                                               |
|                                                                 |
| PLAN FRAGMENT 1                                                 |
|  OUTPUT EXPRS:                                                  |
|   PARTITION: RANDOM                                             |
|                                                                 |
|   STREAM DATA SINK                                              |
|     EXCHANGE ID: 02                                             |
|     UNPARTITIONED                                               |
|                                                                 |
|   1:AGGREGATE (update serialize)                                |
|   |  output: sum(`j`)                                           |
|   |  group by:                                                  |
|   |  tuple ids: 1                                               |
|   |                                                             |
|   0:OlapScanNode                                                |
|      TABLE: t                                                   |
|      PREAGGREGATION: ON                                         |
|      partitions=1/1                                             |
|      rollup: t                                                  |
|      tabletRatio=2/2                                            |
|      tabletList=10007,10009                                     |
|      cardinality=1                                              |
|      avgRowSize=289.0                                           |
|      numNodes=1                                                 |
|      tuple ids: 0                                               |
| tuples:                                                         |
| TupleDescriptor{id=0, tbl=t, byteSize=8, materialized=true}     |
|   SlotDescriptor{id=0, col=j, type=INT}                         |
|     parent=0                                                    |
|     materialized=true                                           |
|     byteSize=4                                                  |
|     byteOffset=4                                                |
|     nullIndicatorByte=0                                         |
|     nullIndicatorBit=0                                          |
|     slotIdx=0                                                   |
|                                                                 |
|                                                                 |
| TupleDescriptor{id=1, tbl=null, byteSize=16, materialized=true} |
|   SlotDescriptor{id=1, col=null, type=BIGINT}                   |
|     parent=1                                                    |
|     materialized=true                                           |
|     byteSize=8                                                  |
|     byteOffset=8                                                |
|     nullIndicatorByte=0                                         |
|     nullIndicatorBit=0                                          |
|     slotIdx=0                                                   |
|

nodes.bodyText: Can you explain why add this for this PR, I noticed you delete this keyword in sql_parser
